description:
| Item               | **RefSeq**                                              | **GenBank**                                               |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| Full Name          | Reference Sequence Database                             | GenBank Sequence Database                                 |
| Maintained By      | NCBI                                                    | NCBI                                                      |
| Data Source        | Curated, selected reference sequences                   | Original sequences submitted by researchers               |
| Curated / Reviewed | ✅ Curated by NCBI (manual + automated)                  | ❌ Stored as submitted without review                      |
| Redundancy         | ❌ Non-redundant (typically one representative per gene) | ✅ Highly redundant (same gene can have multiple versions) |


+ [GCF_000005845.2](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_000005845.2/)
